Actions.Name: List an entity's SEC filings
Actions.Description: Request a list of latest SEC filings for an entity (company or person)

Actions.Name: List Affiliated Owners
Actions.Description: List the owners who in the past have had transactions with a particular company's securities

Actions.Name: Get Financial Fact Trend
Actions.Description: Examine the trend in a fundamental financial data point. For example, get all annual revenue since 2013 for Apple

Actions.Name: Get Common Financials
Actions.Description: Access a set of financial statements for any publicly traded company in simple form

Actions.Name: Get Entity
Actions.Description: Get information about an entity like CIK, name, and trading symbol

Actions.Name: Get Filing
Actions.Description: Get details of a particular SEC filing that has already been processed by Aletheia systems

Actions.Name: When a new insider trade is reported to the SEC
Actions.Description: Company insiders are required to report their security transactions to the SEC. Be notified within seconds of a new insider transaction in any particular company.

Actions.Name: Latest Insider Transactions
Actions.Description: Get the latest insider transactions for a person or company

Actions.Name: When a new filing is filed with the SEC
Actions.Description: Trigger a workflow when a new filing is filed with the SEC and use details from that filing

Actions.Name: Open Common Financial Statements
Actions.Description: Open financial statements from a 10-K or 10-Q filing

Actions.Name: Open Form 4
Actions.Description: Parse a Form 4 (changes in ownership) document

Actions.Name: Search Entities
Actions.Description: Search the Aletheia database for an entity. An entity represents either a company (serving as an security issuer) or a person (serving as a security owner).

Actions.Name: Get Stock Data
Actions.Description: Access stock data for any US-based publicly traded equity security
